thread.title: Brie Larson to replace Jennifer Lawrence in 'The Glass Castle'?
thread.title_full: Brie Larson to replace Jennifer Lawrence in 'The Glass Castle'? - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Brie Larson to replace Jennifer Lawrence in 'The Glass Castle'?
text:
*Los Angeles:* Actress Brie Larson is in early negotiations to headline Lionsgate's "The Glass Castle".
*Jennifer Lawrence. Pic/Santa Banta*
Actress Jennifer Lawrence was to take on the role originally but she was forced to leave the project after the studio had difficulty in finding the male lead, reports variety.com.
If ... Â»
